features: ⏩ EXTRA LARGE, EXTRA COMFORT--Specially designed for the big and tall person, supports up to 500 pounds. Featuring an oversized seat cushion (seat size: 20D" X 24W", 4.92" thick) and a heavy-duty metal base, click to add cart now and you'll have the perfect sturdy chair designed just for you!

⏩FIRST-CLASS SEATING EXPERIENCE--What's inside the seat? High-density molded foam guarantees never-fail comfort and support. What's more, 25 built-in spring pockets create the same elasticity and comfort as a sofa or mattress. Waterfall front seat edges remove pressure in the low leg and improve circulation

⏩FULLY ADJUSTABLE--This computer desk chair has flexible 4D armrests which give comfort and support for your arms and shoulders. Featuring a 360° swivel - height-adjustable mechanism - back angle and rock system to rock back and forth at any angle up to 135°. Underneath the tilt tension knob controls the tension of reclining. Also, comes with adjustable lumbar support, so you can move up and down to the desired height according to your needs

⏩CERTIFIED COMFORT, INVEST IN QUALITY--Each part was carefully selected and finished to perfection. An investment that helps you worry less, and do more. Bonded leather material provides you with a better touch feeling. Smooth-rolling wheels. Class 4 gas cylinder by SGS certified. Powerfully supportive metal base. All tested over 100,000 times and certified for safety and quality.BIFIMA certification, more reliable and sturdy

⏩RISK-FREE PURCHASE, BUY WITH CONFIDENCE!--Complete customer satisfaction is our top priority! All the necessary hardware and tools are included with this mesh chair. Easy to install and ready to use in about 10-15 minutes. Should you have any questions about this product, please do not hesitate to contact us and we will spare no effort to assist you with any questions! Click to Add Cart Now!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Newly Upgraded 500 LBS Mesh Office Chair -- Especially for Big and Tall Person Have not found a solid and comfortable office chair yet? Still troubled by back pain every day? Please don't hesitate to read on, your problems may be solved! COLAMY newly upgraded mesh office chair supports up to 500 pounds, especially designed for the big and tall person. In order to make heavy people sit more comfortably, the seat cushion (seat size: 20D" X 24W", 2" thick) is wider than the ordinary chair. Breathable mesh prevents the accumulation of sweat and heat for long-time sitting, heavy-duty metal base makes the big and tall office chair solid. This ergonomic chair can give you years of use and improve your sitting experience, that's why more and more businessmen, students, and gamers all over the world choose the COLAMY chair for their office but also for their home. Here Are The Top 3 Highlights of Our Chair: High Capacity & Extra Large--Supports up to 500lbs, almost people of any size can sit on this big and tall chair. Besides, featuring an oversized seat cushion (seat size: 20D" X 24W", 2" thick), friendly to heavy people.Extra Comfort & First-class Seating Experience--The chair seat cushion made of high-density molded foam ensures never-fail comfort and strong support. 25 built-in spring pockets play the same role as the sofa or mattress, bring wonderful elasticity and comfort. Waterfall front seat edges help relieve the pressure off your thighs behind the knees, and improve blood circulation to the lower limbs.Fully Adjustable--This computer desk chair has flexible 4D armrests which give comfort and support for your arms and shoulders. Featuring a 360° swivel - height-adjustable mechanism - back angle and recline/rock system to rock back and forth at any angle up to 135°. Underneath the tilt tension knob controls the tension of reclining. Need More Reasons? Ergonomic DesignAdjustable Lumbar SupportMetal Heavy Duty BaseBIFMA Certification

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this chair
reviews.reviewText: This chair has a very wide chair space with room to spare. The arm rests adjust. The seat has a lot of cushion and is very comfortable. It's a heavy chair so the quality in the build is there. It is easy to assemble but again the parts are heavy. It is height adjustable. The only thing is that the back portion of the chair doesn't hug your back. Perhaps because I am 5'4, my back doesn't really touch the back of the chair. However, the strong build of the chair allows me to still have good posture and place a pillow to cushion my back. Otherwise, the chair is great and I am loving the support. It glides on my wooden floors easily and smoothly without damaging the floors. Very comfy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Update to previous review (Nice chair but...)
reviews.reviewText: Update: My original review is listed below (rated 3), as you see, I've changed it to a 5 rating. To my surprise the company reached out to me and offered to replace the chair. In a world where customer support has all but been forgotten, I must admit that I thought it was a prank. It wasn't. They asked me to choose another chair and I did; it was slightly more expensive but was the only one that offered lumbar support. It was delivered quickly, and it is simply a great, comfortable chair. Oh, and did I mention all of this at no charge! Thank you Colamy Home for both the replacement chair and restoring my faith in customer service! Original chair review: This is a nice, sturdy chair. However, like most office chairs, this one too appears to be made for people with small behinds. Understand, the seat is absolutely plus-sized, however, if you have any "junk in the trunk" there is no back support. The curved more ergonomic design reeled me in, yet there is no way to adjust the backrest. Yes, there is a lumbar support which you can push up, however, it does nothing to allow for the natural curves of those of us who are...rounder. Which means that the seat actually ends up being too big and you are either forever trying to scooch back or end up sitting toward the front of the seat (which the instructions warn you against).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy, well made. I'm a big girl, and this chair is very comfortable with lots of room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing is a beast!
reviews.reviewText: I'm a big guy who has a history of breaking chairs: beach and camping chairs, folding metal chairs, patio chairs and ... office chairs! My hope was that this chair would hold up as advertised, it certainly came at a reasonable price for a "heavy duty" chair. First off, it's very heavy and when you open the box you'll see why; the parts are fairly thick steel, not aluminum, the legs are a one-piece unit of welded heavy metal - very solid, the gas cylinder is like a metal dumbell and even the screws and metal lined screw holes are impressive. The seat is like a miniature loveseat - wide and thick, and it's all very easy to assemble. The hardest part was dead lifting the beast onto the cylinder, legs and wheel assembly. The assembled chair is comfortable, simple and feels very beefy. If this chair is as durable as it looks and feels, it's a score!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Heavy duty construction
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Colamy Mid-Back Mesh Office Chair recently. I am super happy with this chair. It was shipped very quickly. I love the heavy duty construction. No cheap plastic parts. The base, pedestal and seat to back connection is all heavy duty metal. Quality arm rests and coasters. The seat and ergonomic back are very comfortable.The assembly was a no-brainer. The hardware comes packaged in individual plastic compartments on a card so no sorting out the bolts. It even came with an allen wrench tool that's actually functional that resembles a cleat tightener for golf spikes. Some care and thought went into the tools and instructions. Everything fit and was included.This chair far exceeded my expectitions. And all for $200 bucks. Buy this chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Really big and tall but not necessarily better
reviews.reviewText: It seemed like a good idea at the time but this chair really is big and tall. It takes up a lot of space and becomes the focal point of a small office. The seat is plenty wide and cushioned well enough but pitched a bit forward and I have yet to figure out how to change that. There's a constant feeling of sliding forward. It is supposed to rock or tilt back but it's very stiff and the adjustment is only for the ability to rock, not tilt the back for comfort or a more comfortable sitting angle. There is a lumbar adjustment but it does not go far enough for my particular back support needs. I'm actually thinking of breaking it somehow and removing the piece that adjusts. The rollers have increased in noise and are not at all quiet when rolling across the floor. Also, the arms have adjustments that are very loose, sideways and front to back. When I try to adjust myself after pitching forward on the seat I grab the arms to lift up and try to slide back. The armrests snap back and forth and are not supportive of the motion to move myself back. Maybe this chair is TOO big and tall for my stature if that's possible. I'm really not happy with this purchase. I work at a computer as well as sew so needed a good chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy! Love it!
reviews.reviewText: I absoultly love this chair!! I have had it for almost 6 months now. It was very easy to assemble. Very comfortable to sit in. I am in it 10 to 15 hours a day durning the week. I love not having my hips touch the arm rest as the seat width is ample wide. I am able to curl one leg up and sit on it without any issue. Having the arm rest able to move up and down and side to side makes it so my arm are always comfortable. I really really love this chair! It is a heavy chair but that is to be expected as it is to hold us heavy people. Very pleased with my purchase!!!
